name: HAELE 3D - Feet Poser Pro
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2327780/HAELE_3D__Feet_Poser_Pro/



Select colors for different parts of the feet, modify the skin and nail materials, fine tune the shapes with morph options, apply preset animations and poses, modify the environment and change the lighting, set up the camera angle and create the perfect shot. Save your work and load it any time.


Click to open sheets!

Features:

  • Preset poses
  • Preset animations
  • Custom posing
  • Editable lights: 3 Point light (color, intensity transformation), Environment light (HDRI map, intensity), Ground light (color, intensity)
  • Environment: HDRI studio backgrounds, various environments, solid colors,
  • Custom backgrounds
  • Floor on/off, color, reflectivity
  • Skin material: editable details, reflectivity, tone saturation, variation
  • Colors: preset skin colors, grayscale and skin tones,
  • Nails: shine, tone, polish colors
  • Adjustable camera angle, location, position and field of view
  • Save and load scenes
  • Load presets
